messages.messageBody:
Do you mean Not Back to School Camp? www.nbtsc.org

Rain has been hanging out at camper parties here on the farm for a year
or two now, and is very much looking forward to going in 3 years, when
she's 13. She is already an expert at People Piles....

Dar

messages.messageBody:
Has anyone sent their children to the unschooling camp advertised in HEM?
My girls have expressed an interest in attending. I was just looking for
comments from anyone with experience. Thanks!
Peace,
Sarah

Homeschooling mama to Amanda, 12 1/2 and Ashleigh 12 1/2
